cyclone.name: HARVEY
cyclone.current_location: about 510 miles SSE of Port O'Connor, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: moving northwest to north-northwest and expected to approach the central Texas coast, then stall and meander near the coast through the weekend while spreading rain bands toward Louisiana
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: central Texas coast near Port O'Connor/Matagorda Bay

port.name: Port of Greater Baton Rouge, LA

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm-surge watch Port Mansfield TX to High Island TX; Hurricane watch north of Port Mansfield to San Luis Pass; Tropical-storm watch Boca de Catan MX to Port Mansfield TX and north of San Luis Pass to High Island TX
weather_observation.warning_coast: None in effect yet (warnings expected Thursday for parts of the Texas coast)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Texas coast from Port Mansfield to High Island with expanding impacts into southwest Louisiana
weather_observation.wind: Low chance (≤9%) of tropical-storm-force winds; occasional gusts 25–35 mph possible late weekend into early next week
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected at the inland port location
weather_observation.rainfall: Potential 3–9 inches of rain with risk of flash flooding Sunday through Tuesday
weather_observation.other_hazards: River and urban flooding could disrupt terminal and landside logistics
